name: Surrounded by mice
description:
This is a RPG role-playing game
Turn-based battle

Woke up, the family entered a big mouse, and still eat people
Not only did the family enter the big mouse, but the whole village was invaded by the mouse.
Must eliminate the mouse


Equipment system

Equipment is divided into weapons, shields, heads, clothes, decorations
5 quality levels
As long as you have money, you can buy it.

Prop system

As long as you have money, you can buy medicines in the item store.
Can recover HP after use
The medicine is divided into 5 quality grades.

Magic system

The protagonist has magic, using magic can cause more damage to the enemy.
Need to consume a small amount of MP
Upgrade can learn new magic

Monster system

When moving on a wild map, there is a probability to trigger a fight
After defeating the monster, you can gain experience, money
